label.value: microarray assay

definition.value: An analyte assay where binding of the analyte to immobilized matrix is measured.

label.value: immunohistochemistry

definition.value: An immunostaining assay to detect and potentially localize antigens within the cells of a tissue section.

label.value: assay measuring the association constant [KA] of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring equilibrium association constant (KA).

label.value: assay measuring the dissociation constant [KD] of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring equilibrium dissociation constant (KD).

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring equilibrium dissociation constant [KD] to determine competitive binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that measures equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) to detect the loss of binding of a known reference ligand to purified-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation.

label.value: assay measuring the half life of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring half life of binding.

label.value: assay measuring the half maximal effective concentration [EC50] of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring half maximal effective concentration (EC50).

label.value: assay measuring the half maximal inhibitory concentration [IC50] of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring half maximal inhibitory concentration (IC50).

label.value: assay measuring the off rate measurement [koff] of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring binding off rate measurement data item (koff).

label.value: assay measuring the MHC ligand binding on rate [kon] of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring binding on rate (kon).

label.value: chromatography assay measuring the association constant [KA] of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: An analytical chromatography assay that measures the association constant [KA] of an antigen binding with an antibody.

label.value: chromatography assay measuring the dissociation constant [KD] of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: An analytical chromatography assay that measures the dissociation constant [KD] of an antigen binding with an antibody.

label.value: hydrogen/deuterium exchange footprinting assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A hydrogen/deuterium exchange footprinting assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: immunohistochemistry assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A immunohistochemistry assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: 3D molecular structure determination assay of a T cell epitope:MHC:TCR complex

definition.value: A 3D structure determination of bound molecular complex assay that characterizes the 3-dimensional structure of a T cell epitope:MHC:TCR complex.

label.value: Genome Analyzer IIx

definition.value: An Illumina Genome Analyzer II which is manufactured by the Illumina corporation. It supports sequencing of single, long or short insert paired end clone libraries relying on sequencing by synthesis technology. The Genome Analyzer IIx is the most widely adopted next-generation sequencing platform and proven and published across the broadest range of research applications.

label.value: Illumina HiSeq 2000

definition.value: A DNA sequencer which is manufactured by the Illumina corporation, with two flow cells and a throughput of up to 55 Gb per day. Built upon sequencing by synthesis technology, the machine is optimized for generation of data for multiple samples in a single run.

label.value: Illumina HiSeq 2500

definition.value: A DNA sequencer which is manufactured by the Illumina corporation, with two flow cells and a throughput of up to 160 Gb per day. Built upon sequencing by synthesis technology, the machine is optimized for generation of data for batching multiple samples or rapid results on a few samples.

label.value: MiSeq

definition.value: A DNA sequencer which is manufactured by the Illumina corporation. Built upon sequencing by synthesis technology, the machine provides an end-to-end solution (cluster generation, amplification, sequencing, and data analysis) in a single machine.

label.value: Methylation 450K BeadChip

definition.value: A methylation BeadChip which is manufactured by the Illumina corporation. Built upon BeadChip tehcnology, the array interrogates ~ 485,000 methylation sites per sample at single-nucleotide resolution.

label.value: Methylation 27K BeadChip

definition.value: A methylation BeadChip which is manufactured by the Illumina corporation. Built upon BeadChip tehcnology, the array interrogates ~ 27,000 CpG sites per sample at single-nucleotide resolution.

label.value: 1M-Duo Infinium HD BeadChip

definition.value: A BeadChip which is manufactured by the Illumina corporation. Built upon BeadChip tehcnology, the array integrates ~ 1 million markers per sample for genotyping, and copy number variation (CNV) and Cytogenetic analysis.

label.value: SOLiD 3 Plus System

definition.value: A DNA sequencer which is manufacted by the Applied Biosystems corporation. Built upon SOLiD sequencing technology, the machine generates greater than 1 billion mappable reads per run.

label.value: Mouse 385K Whole Genome CGH Tiling Array

definition.value: A tiling array which is manufactured by the Nimblegen corporation. Built to analyze DNA sequence copy number by comparative genomic hybridization for mouse DNA against 385,000 features.

label.value: Mouse 3x720K Whole Genome CGH Tiling Array

definition.value: A tiling array which is manufactured by the Nimblegen corporation. Built to analyze DNA sequence copy number by comparative genomic hybridization for mouse DNA against 3x720,000 features.

label.value: Human 3x720K Whole Genome CGH Tiling Array

definition.value: A tiling array which is manufactured by the Nimblegen corporation. Built to analyze DNA sequence copy number by comparative genomic hybridization for human DNA against 3x720,000 features.

label.value: Human 2.1M Whole-Genome CGH Tiling Array v2.0

definition.value: A tiling array which is manufactured by the Nimblegen corporation. Built to analyze DNA sequence copy number by comparative genomic hybridization for human DNA against 2.1 million features.

label.value: PacBio RS II

definition.value: A DNA sequencer which is manufactured by the Pacific Biosciences corporation. Built upon single molecule real-time sequencing technology, the machine is optimized for generation with long reads and high consensus accuracy.

label.value: nCounter Human miRNA Expression array

definition.value: A human array which is manufacutred by NanoString Technologies. Built upon color-coded molecular barcodes technology, the array profiles miRNA with increased specificity and sensitivty than microarrays.

label.value: DNA methylation profiling by ChIP-chip assay

definition.value: An epigenetic modification assay that identifies sites of DNA methylation using ChIP-chip technologies.

label.value: transcription profiling by MPSS assay

definition.value: A transcription profiling assay that uses Massive Parallel Signature Sequencing (MPSS).

label.value: histone modification identification by ChIP-chip assay

definition.value: An epigenetic modification assay that identifies regions containing specific histones and their modifications using ChIP-chip techniques.

label.value: histone modification identification by ChIP-Seq assay

definition.value: An epigenetic modification assay that identifies regions containing specific histones and their modifications using ChIP-Seq techniques.

label.value: transcription factor binding site identification by ChIP-chip assay

definition.value: A transcription factor binding site assay that utilizes ChIP-chip technology.

label.value: transcription factor binding site identification by ChIP-Seq assay

definition.value: A transcription factor binding site assay that utilizes ChIP-seq technology.

label.value: epigenetic modification assay

definition.value: An assay that identifies epigenetic modifications including histone modifications, open chromatin, and DNA methylation.

label.value: NextSeq 500

definition.value: A DNA sequencer which is a desktop sequencer ideal for smaller-scale studies manufactured by the Illumina corporation. It supports sequencing of single, long or short insert paired end clone libraries relying on sequencing by synthesis technology.

label.value: Illumina HiSeq 1000

definition.value: A DNA sequencer which is manufactured by the Illumina corporation, with a single flow cell and a throughput of up to 35 Gb per day. It supports sequencing of single, long or short insert paired end clone libraries relying on sequencing by synthesis technology.

label.value: Human Genome U133 Plus 2.0 tiling array

definition.value: A tiling array which is  a comprehensive whole human genome expression array manufactured by the Affymetrix corporation. Built to analyze DNA sequence copy number by comparative genomic hybridization for human DNA against 47,000 transcripts and variants.

label.value: SOLiD 4 System

definition.value: An AB SOLid System which is manufacted by the Applied Biosystems corporation. Built upon SOLiD sequencing technology, the machine generates greater than 1 billion mappable reads per run.

label.value: Human Exon 1.0 ST tilling array

definition.value: A tiling microarray which is manufactured by the Affymetrix corporation. Built to analyze 3' DNA sequence copy number by comparative genomic hybridization for human DNA against 28,000 genes. It  can be used for gene expression and alternative splicing assay

label.value: Human Genome U133 tiling array

definition.value: A tiling array which is manufactured by the Affymetrix corporation. Built to analyze DNA sequence copy number by comparative genomic hybridization for human DNA against 39,000 transcripts and variants.

label.value: Genome Analyzer IIe

definition.value: An Illumina Genome Analyzer II which is manufactured by the Illumina corporation. It supports sequencing of single, long or short insert paired end clone libraries relying on sequencing by synthesis technology. The Genome Analyzer IIe makes industry-leading next-generation sequencing technology accessible to more laboratories.

label.value: SAGE ditag library preparation

definition.value: A library preparation in which tags identifiying transcripts are created, ligated to form ditags, amplified, concatemerized and ligated into a vector to create a library.

label.value: serial analysis of gene expression assay

definition.value: A transcription profiling assay that quantifies RNA through creating short signature tags of the messages and ligating them into a larger molecule than was sequenced.

label.value: genotyping by tiling array assay

definition.value: A genotyping by array assay that uses tiling array technology.

label.value: genotyping by SNP array assay

definition.value: A genotyping by array assay that uses SNP array technology.

label.value: parallel analysis of RNA structure assay

definition.value: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay that performs simultaneous in vitro profiling of the secondary structure of thousands of RNA species at single nucleotide resolution using enzymatic probing based on deep sequencing fragments of RNAs that were treated with structure-specific enzymes

label.value: translation-associated transcript leader sequencing assay

definition.value: An RNA-seq assay that combines TL-seq with polysome fractionation

label.value: transcript leader sequencing assay

definition.value: An RNA-seq assay that combines enzymatic capture of m(7)G-capped mRNA 5' ends with high-throughput sequencing.
